keywords.value: United States Defense and Military Forces
keywords.name: subject

lead_paragraph: There’s a whole new way to mess with Texas.
snippet: There’s a whole new way to mess with Texas.
abstract: Gail Collins Op-Ed column submits that Utah, while heavily Republican and pro-gun, is far less concerned than Texas about military exercise known as Jade Helm 15 scheduled to be carried out in Southwest; notes Texas leaders and residents claim exercise is cover for government plot to take over area and confiscate residents' guns; says small percentage of both American public and leadership have always been crazy, but in contemporary political climate Texas' saner conservatives are loath to disagree with them.
